website_summaries.verdict: This is a fun and exciting LEGO Junior set for kiddos ages 4 and up who have an interest in airplanes.
pros: Closely resembles what kids would see at a real airport with 5 mini figures, a plane, a terminal, and many other items and accessories
Kids can even load luggage onto plane via play conveyor belt, making it even more lifelike
cons: All of the mini figures are nicely detailed except for the flight captain, who is more plain

customer_reviews.title: A must for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on sale and glad I did! It goes well with out airports and Lego world we have created in our house. Love the fact that my son is now into Lego at the age of 2.6 years. This is perfect for him because he loves building my sets with tiny pieces and sometimes he gets frustrated because of his small fingers lol. Yes I know he is too young for Lego but my kiddo is a smart one and can build experts sets on his own minus breaking the fragile pieces here and there. Get this set for your kiddo or for your own collection when on sale for 40%+ off.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego set for plane lovers and hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This Lego set did not disappoint. It came with many components to make the airport complete including airplanes, conveyor belts, luggage accessories, pilots, passengers and more. Our 3 year old loved this set, and was able to build quite a few pieces by looking at the instructions. For the price, we found this set to be a very good deal. It's perfect for hours of fun and imagination!
customer_reviews.author: JennL

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger builders
customer_reviews.text: My son(4 yrs) really enjoyed building this set. It was easy enough for him to build (with some help). What’s great about the juniors sets is that some of the pieces are larger so there are a few less things to construct. In this set the main bodies of the planes are one piece which makes it easier for younger kids to build.
customer_reviews.author: DANA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for ages 4 and up!
customer_reviews.text: An awesome set for kids 4+ ! The Lego Junior line is the same as the Lego 4+ series. It’s nice because they are the same size Legos, but easier to build and no stickers. The base for the vehicles always have one piece versus multiple bricks. This way the younger kids can actually play with it. This is a great addition to our Lego City!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 5 year-old grandson. Needs a little parental assistance.
customer_reviews.text: Boys love cars, planes, and trains. Young children will need some parental help, though simplified for their age group. This can be a stand-alone toy or other aspects of the set can be integrated into the vehicle based town.
customer_reviews.author: laundrynazi

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for you buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great LEGO set for the money. Lots of pieces and area of the airport to play with. My grandson was super excited and his parents were really happy with it to. I was proud to give it!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Book Gift For Father’s Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: I’m Going To Surprise My Grandson With These LEGOS. It Would’ve Made An Awesome Birthday Gift Too. My 4Yr Old Grandson Will Absolutely LOVE Having This As Part Of His Large LEGO Collection.
customer_reviews.author: #1NanaClause🤶🏾

customer_reviews.title: Fun family activity
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun family activity. My 5 year old daughter was able to assemble some parts but not the whole model. She needed help.
customer_reviews.author: Anne R. Bonifacio

customer_reviews.title: Fun set!
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 year old requested this for Christmas, he sat down and built it all by himself. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ineck

customer_reviews.title: Lego does it again
customer_reviews.text: My three yr old loved building this set. He only needed a little help staying on the correct step and not jumping ahead to far. He does have previous lego playing experience with the classic box.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with Lego sets.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson (5 yrs old) loves this Lego set. It is fun and easy to build. He played with it for hours after it was built.
customer_reviews.author: sherry miller

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson plays with regular sized Legos. These "Junior" sized Legos are relatively the same size.
customer_reviews.author: kay3k

customer_reviews.title: Logo all the way
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for twins, they got a plane each in it. You can’t go wrong with LEGO.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Large junior set
customer_reviews.text: This a great junior set. However, being a junior set each airplane/car is assembled of just a few pieces so they are not as large when assembled if you are trying to combine them with other LEGO airport sets.
customer_reviews.author: Dolira

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect blend of easy to build yet with multiple features so your kid feels like it's a complicated "big boy" logo set
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning to follow directions independently
customer_reviews.text: Never a bad word for this legs loving Grandma and 5 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Philson

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved.
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? Kid loved it and put it together mostly by himself. He’s four.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my five year old. He loved that he was able to put the whole thing together with no help.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Booe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an airplane loving kid
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this set. I had to put most of it together for him, but he likes to attach the wheels :D The details on this set are really great, especially the luggage cart and the belt that turns. I suspect we'll be getting a lot of use out of this set!
customer_reviews.author: J. Shetrone

customer_reviews.title: Cool set with lots of unique attributes
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set. My older daughter has a car shop so we thought this might be a good one for lesser skills....it is! Love it just as much as the non-juniors sets!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Zolar

customer_reviews.title: Still fun to play with after it’s assembled!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set! So often you spend big money for LEGO sets and the kids never play with them once they’re together. This one is not like that at all. My son (almost 5) was able to put most of it together and has had so much fun play with it for two weeks now. He loves the conveyor belt for the luggage and the little luggage carrier train that takes it to the planes. Really great set!
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

product_meta.title: LEGO Juniors City Central Airport 10764 Building Kit (376 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Take off to adventure at the LEGO Juniors 10764 City Central Airport! This airport toy with passenger and cargo planes is an easy LEGO set featuring an airport terminal with Starter Brick baseplate and wall element, control tower and working conveyor belt. There’s also a luggage truck with 2 trailers and 2 airplanes with Starter Brick bases and space for the pilots, plus a floodlight with space for tools and a fuel truck with fueling station. This first LEGO airport set include a simple guide to build and play, to help build confidence in younger children ages 4+. Includes 5 minifigures.
feature_bullets: Build a bustling airport terminal with a working baggage conveyer belt and 2 toy airplanes with this airport starter LEGO set!
This early-years LEGO airport playset includes 5 minifigures: 2 pilots, 2 airport workers and a tourist

This airport toy preschool LEGO set measures over 5-inch (15cm) high, 7-inch (19 cm) wide and 2-inch (6cm) deep  Cargo plane measures over 1-inch (5cm) high, 5-inch (13cm) long and 5-inch (14cm) wide Passenger plane measures over 2-inch (7cm) high, 5-inch (13cm) long and 5-inch (14cm) wide  Luggage cart with 2 trailers measures over 1-inch (3cm) high, 5-inch (13cm) long and 1-inch (3cm) wide
376 pieces – Kindergarten airport set with airplanes for boys and girls aged 4+ and for fans and kids of all ages
The LEGO Juniors City Central Airport 10764 entry-level LEGO kit can be built together with all other original LEGO construction toys and LEGO bricks for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
